Parameters.Name: dsl
Parameters.Value: ${(current_update.RegisteredForActualService.IsChanged || current_update.Status.IsChanged || current_update.Priority.IsChanged || current_update.Suspended.IsChanged || current_update.PhaseId.IsChanged) && current_update.PhaseId.NewValue != 'Log' && current_update.PhaseId.NewValue != 'Close' && current_update.PhaseId.NewValue != 'Abandon'}

Parameters.Name: dsl
Parameters.Value: ${(entity.ImpactScope == 'Enterprise' && entity.Urgency == 'TotalLossOfService') || (entity.ImpactScope == 'Enterprise' && entity.Urgency == 'TotalLossOfService' && entity.RequestedForPerson.AELVIPStatus_c == 'AELIsVip_c') || (entity.ImpactScope == 'Enterprise' && entity.Urgency == 'SevereDisruption' && entity.RequestedForPerson.AELVIPStatus_c == 'AELIsVip_c') || (entity.ImpactScope == 'SiteOrDepartment' && entity.Urgency == 'TotalLossOfService' && entity.RequestedForPerson.AELVIPStatus_c == 'AELIsVip_c') || (entity.ImpactScope == 'SiteOrDepartment' && entity.Urgency == 'SevereDisruption' && entity.RequestedForPerson.AELVIPStatus_c == 'AELIsVip_c')}

Parameters.Name: dsl
